title: Fans of Ovie Soko and India Reynolds predict split as they're barely seen together
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island couple Ovie Soko and India Reynolds have sparked split speculation amongst fans as the pair have barely been seen together since they left the villa.

Fans of the basketball star and model are curious to know whether the pair are still together as the last post Ovie featured on India's Instagram was on August 18.

Ovie and India have both been active on social media since, as they post quite frequently - but fans just want to know what's going on.

The star recently posted a sultry photo posing in a teeny white bikini which exposed a lot of underboob, and it drove followers crazy as they asked where her hunky boyfriend is.

One concerned fan asked: "What happened to ovie", and another questioned: "You and Ovie broke up?"

(Image: Colin Hawkins photography/Lovehoney)

(Image: GC Images)

Their last public appearance was in September at the TV Choice awards, where the couple admitted they were taking the right steps.

In an interview on the red carpet, Ovie confirmed that the pair are official. He laughed: "Yeah, I'm saying yes," while India nodded in agreement.

Ovie has recently signed a deal with ASOS while India is jetting off for work, which suggests the couple are finding it hard to see each other as much.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

It follows cheating claims in September, as India was forced to deny she had kissed her ex footballer boyfriend Kieran Gibbs.

Rumours circulated when she attended his birthday party in Portugal shortly after her sunny summer in Mallorca.

(Image: REX)

A source told the MailOnline: "She attended his birthday party with her family.

"She's in love with Ovie and would never hurt him. She's shocked and hurt at the claims."

But a representative for India claimed: "There is no truth in this whatsoever and India and Ovie are very much still together."
description: Love Island faves India and Ovie haven't been seen together since September
